CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( Auto_Loan_Purpose__c , 'Purchase a Motor Vehicle'),MIN( Market_Value_of_Vehicle__c , Purchase_Price_of_Vehicle__c ) , IF(ISPICKVAL( Auto_Loan_Purpose__c , 'Refinance existing Auto Loan'),MIN( Market_Value_of_Vehicle__c , Loan_Balance_of_Vehicle__c ),null ) )
CustomField.label: Minimum (MV/LB,PP)
